name: Elements of Heroes
description:
My first attempt at a turn based RPG, based off of my ever attempt at a game, (Which was an unfinished text based rpg played in the console.) However this game actually has graphics and the enemies can attack you... Ahh how i've grown.

W, A, S, D to move, start a battle with Space Bar, there are some bugs with the abilities

This will be my third entry for 1GAM, but it is in development at the moment, so there will be bugs.
